title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
description: Financial inclusion program — zero-balance bank accounts, Rupay card and insurance benefits.

title: Ayushman Bharat - Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)
description: Health coverage up to ₹5 lakh per family for secondary and tertiary hospitalisation.

title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY) - Urban & Gramin
description: Affordable housing for eligible beneficiaries in urban and rural areas.

title: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
description: Free LPG connections for women from BPL households to reduce indoor pollution.

title: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: Direct income support to farmer families of ₹6,000 per year in three equal instalments.

title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Crop insurance scheme to protect farmers against crop failure.

title: PM SVANidhi (Street Vendor's Atmanirbhar Nidhi)
description: Affordable loan facility for street vendors to restart businesses post-COVID.

title: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY)
description: Loans up to ₹10 lakh to non-corporate, non-farm micro and small enterprises.

title: Stand Up India
description: Facilitates bank loans between ₹10 lakh and ₹1 crore to SC/ST and women entrepreneurs.

title: Startup India
description: Support for startups with incubation, funding, tax and regulatory benefits.

title: Atal Pension Yojana (APY)
description: Pension scheme for workers in the unorganised sector with guaranteed minimum pension.

title: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
description: Long-term small savings scheme for the girl child, encouraging parents to build a fund.

title: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
description: Skill training and certification to boost employability of youth.

title: National Rural Livelihood Mission (DAY-NRLM)
description: Promotes self-employment and organization of rural poor into SHGs.

title: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana (DDUGJY)
description: Rural electrification and improvement of rural electricity distribution.

title: Swachh Bharat Mission (SBM)
description: Nationwide campaign for sanitation, building toilets and ending open defecation.

title: Jal Jeevan Mission
description: Ensures functional household tap connections to all rural households.

title: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY)
description: Provides all-weather road connectivity to unconnected habitations in rural areas.

title: National Food Security Mission (NFSM)
description: Increases production of rice, wheat, pulses, coarse cereals and commercial crops.

title: National Scholarship Portal
description: Centralised portal to apply for multiple scholarships across central and state schemes.

title: Mid Day Meal Scheme (MDMS)
description: Provides hot cooked meals to children in government and government-aided schools.

title: Integrated Child Development Services (ICDS)
description: Supplementary nutrition, preschool education and health for children and mothers.

title: PM KUSUM (Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyan)
description: Support for solarisation of farmers' pumps and decentralised renewable energy.

title: National Social Assistance Programme (NSAP)
description: Provides social assistance benefits to senior citizens, widows and disabled persons.

title: e-Shram
description: National database of unorganised workers to extend welfare benefits and portability.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana - Health & Wellness Centres (AB-HWCs)
description: Strengthening primary healthcare via Health & Wellness Centres across the country.

title: National Pension System (NPS) - Atal Pension related
description: Voluntary, defined contribution pension system regulated by PFRDA.

title: Pradhan Mantri Shram Yogi Maan-dhan
description: Pension scheme for unorganised sector workers, simple monthly contribution-based pension.

title: PM Svanidhi - Vendor Toolkits & Benefits
description: Digital & financial literacy support for street vendors along with loans & benefits.

title: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY)
description: Maternity benefit program providing cash to pregnant and lactating women.

title: PM Umeed - Skill & Self-Employment
description: Central/state combined programs for entrepreneurship and self-employment training.

title: Pradhan Mantri Swanidhi Yojana - Digital Training
description: Digital training modules for street vendors and micro-entrepreneurs.

title: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana - Rural Road Upgrades
description: Upgrading and maintaining rural roads for better connectivity and growth.

title: National Livestock Mission
description: Enhances livestock productivity and supports animal husbandry.

title: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana - Solarization
description: Promotes off-grid and solar solutions for rural electrification.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Seva Kendra (Common Service Centres)
description: Digital delivery of public services through CSCs in rural areas.

title: National Digital Health Mission - Ayushman Bharat Health Data
description: Digital health IDs and health records for citizens.

title: PM Poshan (formerly Mid Day Meal Scheme modernization)
description: Nutritional support and mid-day meals for school students with improved quality.

title: National Urban Livelihoods Mission (DAY-NULM)
description: Supports urban poor through self-employment and skill development programs.

title: Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana (Saubhagya)
description: Household electrification scheme to provide electricity connections.

title: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS)
description: Provides financial support to establishments for engaging apprentices.

title: Pradhan Mantri Gramin Awaas Mission - PMAY-G
description: Rural housing for houseless and homeless people with financial support.

title: National Heritage Mission - Cultural Schemes
description: Support for preservation and promotion of cultural heritage and historic sites.

title: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana - Maintenance
description: Ongoing maintenance and quality improvement for rural roads.

title: PM Kisan Maan Dhan Yojana - Pension For Farmers
description: Voluntary pension scheme for small and marginal farmers.

title: National e-Governance Plan (NeGP)
description: Framework to make all government services available to the public electronically.

title: Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Ration Yojana (e-Ration/DBT) - State Linked
description: Direct benefit transfer of food subsidies via state distribution systems.

title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Beneficiary Led Construction (BLC)
description: Financial assistance for construction/upgradation of houses by beneficiaries.

title: Mission Indradhanush (Universal Immunization Programme strengthening)
description: Accelerated immunisation program to increase vaccine coverage.

title: PM Formalisation of Micro Food Processing Enterprises (PMFME)
description: Support clusters of micro food processing enterprises with credit and technology.

title: Lakshmir Bhandar (West Bengal)
description: Monthly direct benefit transfer to women beneficiaries in West Bengal.

title: Kanyashree Prakalpa (West Bengal)
description: Conditional cash transfer scheme to promote education and delay marriage of girls.

title: Swasthya Sathi (West Bengal)
description: Health insurance for families with smart card-based cashless treatment.

title: Rupashree (West Bengal)
description: One-time grant for marriage of adult girls from disadvantaged families.

title: Sabooj Sathi (West Bengal)
description: Free bicycle scheme for secondary & higher secondary students.

title: Kushal Yuva (Bihar)
description: Skill development and placement assistance for Bihar youth.

title: Mukhyamantri Kanya Utthan Yojana (Bihar)
description: Financial assistance and scholarships for girl child education in Bihar.

title: Bihar Student Credit Card
description: Education loan facility for higher education for Bihar students.

title: KALIA (Krushak Assistance for Livelihood & Income Augmentation) - Odisha
description: Support for cultivators, landless agricultural households and vulnerable agricultural families.

title: Biju Swasthya Kalyan Yojana (BSKY) - Odisha
description: Health coverage scheme for Odisha residents, including cashless tertiary care.

title: Delhi Ration e-Coupon
description: Ration support and e-coupons for eligible residents in Delhi.

title: Delhi Scholarship Portal
description: Scholarships for students of Delhi for various categories and courses.

title: MahaDBT Scholarships (Maharashtra)
description: Direct Benefit Transfer portal for scholarships and citizen schemes in Maharashtra.

title: Mahatma Jyotirao Phule Jan Arogya Yojana (Maharashtra)
description: State health insurance scheme providing coverage to eligible families.

title: Chief Minister Rojgar Yojana (Tamil Nadu - example)
description: State-level employment generation and training support (varies by state).

title: Anna Bhagya / Public Distribution System (State linked)
description: Subsidised foodgrain distribution via ration cards and PDS networks (state portals).

title: PM Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
description: Crop and agriculture loan card for easy access to credit for farmers.

title: National Scholarship Portal - Merit & Means
description: Apply for central and state scholarships from a single portal.

title: National AYUSH Mission
description: Promotes AYUSH systems of medicine and provides health services through AYUSH clinics.

title: Pradhan Mantri Shram Yogi Maan-dhan (PM-SYM)
description: Pension scheme for unorganised sector workers, providing minimum guaranteed pension.

description: Financial inclusion program — zero-balance bank accounts, Rupay card and insurance benefits.
